cutter.math

Class CalculationMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • cutter.math.CalculationMethod

  • public class CalculationMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has the functionality to automatically generate a MathML or HTML based calculation method You need to use CutterAPIs own math methods to make use of this feature, or implement the addCalculationStep()-method and the add descriptionForLastStep-method into your own code.
    Author:
    Phil Niehus

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int pointCount 
      int vectorCount

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CalculationMethod()
      This constructor defines the CalculationMethod without title
      CalculationMethod(java.lang.String title)
      This constructor defines the CalculationMethod with title

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCalculationStep(java.lang.String stepMathML)
      This method adds MathML code to the calculation method
      java.lang.String getHTML()
      This method returns the calculation method as HTML as a String
      java.lang.String getMathML()
      This method returns the calculation method as MathML
      void saveHtmlToFile(java.io.File file) 
      void setDescriptionForLastStep(java.lang.String description)
      Sets the description of the last calculation step to the given Text/HTML
      void setTask(java.lang.String task)
      This method sets the task that is shown in the HTML version of the calculation method The box for the task will not be added if there is no task set
      void unsetTask()
      This method removes a task that has been set before
